name: Antero
description:
It would not do to lose sight of your task. 

In this first-person perspective based puzzler, you traverse a tranquil world where the concept of object permanence does not exist. Here, objects you can't see don't exist. 

Navigate through mind bending and reality defying puzzles, using only the objects you can see.

Credits:

Graphic Design - Samuel Li

Music - Twin Musicom

                 Max Relax

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y1FuvLt2jgY&ab_channel=maxrelax
